title: Permission shall be necessary for carrying out temporary construction
clause_text: Permission shall be necessary for carrying out temporary construction. The Authority may grant permission for temporary construction for a period not exceeding six months at a time and in the aggregate not exceeding a period of one year. Such permission may be given by him for the construction of the following, viz. :- Structures for protection from the rain or covering of the terraces during monsoon only. Pandals for fairs, ceremonies, religious functions, etc. on public land. Structures for ancillary works for quarrying operations in conforming zones. Government milk booths, telephone booths, MAFFCO stall and ATM Centres. Transit accommodation for persons to be rehabilitated in a new construction.
